desc: 测试员工关联兴趣爱好，1对多
name: SelectStaffLookupHobby

oqls.desc: 查询员工关联兴趣爱好
oqls.name: SelectStaffLookupHobby
oqls.oql: select staffId, staffName, staffCode, hobbies(id, name, code, descr) from Staff where staffName like '%张三%'
oqls.sql: select STA_ID, STA_NAME, STA_CODE, HOBBIES from STAFF where STAFF_NAME like '%张三%'
oqls.lookupSql: select RECORD_ID, NAME, CODE, DESCR from HOBBY where RECORD_ID in (#{ids})
